name: SPACELORE!
description:
Controls:

Left/Right -> turn

Up -> thrust

SpaceBar -> fire

Powerups:

- Red powerups improve your weapon

- Green circle powerups increase your maneuverability

- Green diamonds add a deflector shield to your ship - these are rarer than the other powerups

Tips:

- Stay away from the edges of the screen

- Shoot the smallest asteroids first

- Maneuver to a safe place, then start shooting

- It might not be a good idea to max out your speed (the ship is pretty squirrely at that leve)
